title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.3 - Freight excluded from definitions of waterborne freight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.3 - Freight excluded from definitions of waterborne freight

State Regulations

For the purposes of article VI of the Act and this Part, waterborne freight shall not include freight loaded within the Port of New York

District upon motor vessels not in excess of 115 foot length. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
